content:
### EXISTING STRUCTURES
### Iron Ore Mine at position(-17.0, -50.0)
Consists of following entities
-  Burner mining drill (position (-17.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-16.5, -51.5)
-  Burner mining drill (position (-15.0, -50.0)) and a transport belt at position (-15.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -50.5)) that puts into the transport belt at position (-14.5, -51.5)
-  Burner inserter (position (-13.5, -48.5)) that puts into the transport belt at position (-12.5, -48.5)

### Furnace at position(-10.0, -49.0)
Consists of a stone furnace at position (-10.0, -49.0) with no input or output belts connected

### Chest at position(-16.5, -47.5)
Consists of a wooden chest at position (-16.5, -47.5) with a burner inserter (position (-16.5, -46.5)) that puts into the chest

### Belt Group
Consists of two belt groups:
- One with input belt at position ((-17.5, -51.5) -> (-15.5, -51.5)) and output belt at position ((-14.5, -51.5) -> (-12.5, -51.5))
- One with input belt at position ((-12.5, -46.5) -> (-12.5, -48.5)) and output belt at position ((-12.5, -47.5) -> (-12.5, -49.5))

### ERROR TIPS
### Errors when inserting items into a non-existent entity
- Ensure that the entity you are trying to insert into exists and is in the correct position before attempting to insert items
### Errors when using burner mining drills without fuel
- Make sure to fuel the burner mining drills before attempting to mine
### Errors when using furnaces without input or output belts
- Ensure that the furnace has input and output belts connected before attempting to smelt items
### Errors when using inserter without a source or destination
- Make sure to set the source and destination of the inserter before attempting to use it

### NAMESPACE
* Important variables:
  + `wooden-chest`: type `Entity`, quantity: 2
  + `transport-belt`: type `Entity`, quantity: 7
  + `burner-mining-drill`: type `Entity`, quantity: 1
  + `stone-furnace`: type `Entity`, quantity: 1
  + `iron-ore`: type `Item`, quantity: 1143
  + `iron-plate`: type `Item`, quantity: 168
* Utility functions:
  + `insert_item`: type `function`, invoked multiple times, failed due to non-existent entity
  + `fuel_burner_drill`: type `function`, not invoked, reason: no coal in inventory
